EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Reminder - Mar16 Terms
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar: Login Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for the "Intapp Open for Terms of Business Management" webinar. It will start in 30 minutes, at 9:00am Pacific / 12:00pm Eastern / 5:00pm GMT. Video and audio access instructions are below.
If you have any trouble logging into the webinar, please email Lea.Schweitzer@intapp.com for technical support.
Webinar Title: Intapp Open for Terms of Business Management
Video:
Conference URL: https://intappinc.webex.com/intappinc/j.php?J=923119692 Audio:
US/Canada Toll-Free: (877) 817-7103 UK Toll-Free: 0 800 032 3836 International Toll: (813) 337-6188
Conference Code: 45720458 (if you use the international toll number, an operator may ask for this) Please note that you must dial in to one of the above numbers to connect to the audio. Audio is not available through the WebEx client.
The webinar will start right on time, we recommend joining 5-10 minutes early.
